mapper.select:
select a.* from member_growth_record a, (select user_id, max(create_time) create_time from member_growth_record GROUP BY user_id) b
a.user_id = b.user_id and a.create_time = b.create_time

select c.user_id userId, c.user_name userName, c.current_level level, ( case #{type} when 0 then d.week_wage when 1 then d.month_wage when 2 then d.birth_gift_money when 3 then d.red_envelope else 0 end ) rewordAmount from ( select id, user_id, user_name, create_time, current_level from member_growth_record where id in (select max(id) from member_growth_record GROUP BY user_id) ) c LEFT JOIN member_growth_level d ON c.current_level = d.`level`
c.current_level != 0 and d.`level` != 0
AND d.week_wage > 0
AND d.month_wage > 0
